lead_paragraph: Darryl Sutter stepped down as coach of the Calgary Flames yesterday and handed over the duties to his assistant Jim Playfair. The move allows Sutter to focus more on his role as general manager.
snippet: Darryl Sutter stepped down as coach of the Calgary Flames yesterday and handed over the duties to his assistant Jim Playfair. The move allows Sutter to focus more on his role as general manager.
